## Events.CommentChange.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `CommentChange` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(opt_comment?: WorkspaceComment, opt_oldContents?: string, opt_newContents?: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_comment | [WorkspaceComment](./blockly.workspacecomment_class.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The comment that is being changed. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_oldContents | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Previous contents of the comment. |
|  opt\_newContents | string | <i>(Optional)</i> New contents of the comment. |
